message.content: This question requires some knowledge about renewable energy sources. The main reason people want to use wind as an energy source is because it is an everlasting supply. Unlike fossil fuels, which are finite and will eventually run out, wind is a renewable resource that will continue to be available as long as the sun shines and the Earth rotates. Options (A), (B), and (C) are unrelated to the use of wind as an energy source.
